name: pikaday2
description: A refreshing JavaScript Datepicker â€” lightweight, no dependencies, modular CSS

scripts.build: npm run build-src && npm run build-dist
scripts.build-src: (echo '(function() {'; babel --modules ignore src/lib/utils.js; babel --modules ignore src/lib/events.js; babel --modules ignore src/lib/classutils.js; babel --modules ignore src/lib/dateutils.js; babel --modules ignore src/lib/templating.js; babel --stage 0 --modules ignore src/pikaday2.js; echo 'window.Pikaday2 = Pikaday2; }())') > dist/pikaday2.js
